metadata.description: You Shouto, an arrogant young CEO would not let Riku Gen, the guy he had been obsessing with for 3 years escape for the second time. For Riku, this chase-and-run game is a nightmare, but slowly but sure he realized that he had already been chained by the pleasure of cruel destiny with the man he despised the most. "Absolute Obedience 〜If You Don't Obey me〜" is a tale of surprise and dark romance that would absolutely make the reader enchanted until the end.
metadata.name: Absolute Obedience ~If you don't obey me~ (Yaoi Manga)
